name: Drink Em Up Free
description:
Get the funniest party game in the world! Drink 'Em Up is the best selling and simple to play drinking game that will give you and your friends a night to remember...or possibly forget!

The perfect party game for adults, college and university students of all ages (well, legal drinking ages).

So simple to play even that one friend who struggles to stand after they've drunk 1 beer (you know the one...) will manage it.

Drink 'Em Up can be played anytime, anywhere (including offline) with just 2 players or a whole party-full. Seize the moment, apologize to your liver, and get playing tonight!

Features:
- Simple: Each turn you either pass, drink, or create a rule
- Classic bar style theme
- Forfeits for rule breakers and sinners!
- Rule Keeper: Tracks rules so your intoxicated brain doesn't need to
- Free version includes 5 rules from our Classic rule pack.
- Over 65 rules and forfeits available through additional game packs (studies show packs make the game 269% more enjoyable*)

What do you mean you haven't got it yet?! Why are you still reading?! Nobody reads this far! Stop messing about, click download and start playing...unless you're operating heavy machinery, then perhaps wait.

*all studies are entirely fictional

Disclaimer
Naturally we recommend you drink and act responsibly. Don’t be that drunk person, who know the type, no-one likes that person and especially not your family. If you're not of legal drinking age, don't worry, the game is still fun using non-alcoholic drinks (obviously less fun though, there is a reason alcohol is so popular).
